text:
Berlin, Germany - eKomi Ltd. (Full-Time) eKomi is a leading provider of feedback management, primarily for web shops and services. One of the reasons weâ€™ve been so successfully so quickly in a relatively new field is that we strive to stay up-to-date and provide quality services for our customers empowering them to deliver quality to their customers as well. We are looking for front- and back-end developers to join our growing development team. A Variety of Tools We Use -PHP/MySql -jQuery, HTML, CSS -nginx, Apache, Varnish The jobs are located in Berlin, Germany, and they are in-office positions. We have a great team and are looking for the right people to further strengthen our team. For job applicants, please email ramirez@ekomi.de

Extra info here: http://berlinstartupjobs.com/companies/ekomi/
